attributes.action: Immediate closure of our borders due to the daily terriost attacks in Europe
attributes.additional_details: Look at any news sources. ISIS has already told us they.have flooded Europe with Juhadists
attributes.background: There are attacks happening daily in Europe  from Islamic extremist who follow ISIS and other terriost groups. Europe is flooded with Islamic migrants, which many are ISIS infiltrators. These people whish to cause death and destruction and appear to.be attacking mainly Christians. It will get worse
